janadhipathiwarana paà·Šrathipala wikruthi kirima sandaha jathyanthara oththusewa wala mangapenwima matha wiwidha anthawadi kandayam wisin sinhala bauddha janathawa saha muslim janathawa athara awishwasaya saha gatum athikirima sandaha hitha matha diyath kala bawata chodana ella wana aluthgama gatuma aadi aagamika gatum pilibandawa widhimath parikshanayak pawathwa ema kumanthaà·Šranaya helidaraw kota waradikaruwanta danduwam labadiya yuthu bawa saha ee mangin jathika samangiya thahawuru kirima sandaha nawa aarambhayak gatha yuthu bawa.

ihatha prakashayan siyalla padanam karaganimin ma uthsaha karanne, obe danumata yamak ekathu kirima, me pilibandawa oba sathu danumen, mama da yamak igenaganima, me pilibandawa harawath sanwadayak godanagima, yana apekshawan itukara ganimatayi.

watalim katayuthuwaladi shri lanka polisiya, wishesha karya balakaya, nawika hamudawa saha anekuth aayathana ekwa katayuthu karana lesath antharayakara aushadha palaka jathika mandalaya saha eeta adala sesu aayathana nithipathi departhamenthuwa samanga ekwa awashya nithi sampadanaya kirime hakiyawa soya balana lesada amathyawaraya ehidi upades labadenu labiya.

premadasa pitiyedi heta (31da) pawathwimata niyamitha shri lanka-indiya siwuwani ekdina tharagaya sandaha thewani tharagayata nayakathwaya laba dun chamara kapugedara krida nokaranu athayi wartha wana athara, eeta hethuwa ohu pitakonde aabadhayakin pelena nisa bawada pawase.
sakachcha margayen gatalu wisada gaththa.

onna ithin me wassath ekka hiti gaman eka eka de hoyanna hithenawa.waw badi rate idalath waw gana danne nathnam ithin wadak na kiyalayi mama hithanne me dawas wala podi pissuwak hadila waw gana hoyamin inne..ithin idiriyedi waw sanskruthiya gana ape basawen monawahari liyaweyi eekatath ekka prayojanawath weyine kiyalayi,nodanna ayata dana gannayi, ape waw karmanthaye ithihasaya tikak kiyannam.....mekath ithin patan ganne wijayagen thamayi onna.....
